code: @Test @SuppressWarnings("resource") public void testWebApplicationObjectSupport() {     StaticWebApplicationContext wac = new StaticWebApplicationContext().     wac.setServletContext(new MockServletContext()).     File tempDir = new File("").     wac.getServletContext().setAttribute(WebUtils.TEMP_DIR_CONTEXT_ATTRIBUTE, tempDir).     wac.registerBeanDefinition("test", new RootBeanDefinition(TestWebApplicationObject.class)).     wac.refresh().     WebApplicationObjectSupport wao = (WebApplicationObjectSupport) wac.getBean("test").     assertEquals(wao.getServletContext(), wac.getServletContext()).     assertEquals(wao.getTempDir(), tempDir). }

@Test @SuppressWarnings("resource") public void testWebApplicationObjectSupportWithWrongContext() {     StaticApplicationContext ac = new StaticApplicationContext().     ac.registerBeanDefinition("test", new RootBeanDefinition(TestWebApplicationObject.class)).     WebApplicationObjectSupport wao = (WebApplicationObjectSupport) ac.getBean("test").     try {         wao.getWebApplicationContext().         fail("Should have thrown IllegalStateException").     } catch (IllegalStateException ex) {     // expected     } }
